Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Count|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
Count:(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Count#CountFHIR R5 ComplexType `Count` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. Element `Count` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Count`, but has no comparisons.
Count.value (value):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Count#Count.valueElement `Count.value` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Count.value`, but has no comparisons.
Count.comparator (comparator):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Count#Count.comparatorNote that the target element context `Count.comparator` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier. Element `Count.comparator` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Count.comparator`, but has no comparisons.
Count.unit (unit):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Count#Count.unitElement `Count.unit` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Count.unit`, but has no comparisons.
Count.system (system):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Count#Count.systemElement `Count.system` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Count.system`, but has no comparisons.
Count.code (code):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Count#Count.codeElement `Count.code` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Count.code`, but has no comparisons.

name: ConceptMapR5CountElementsForR4Count
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 ComplexType `Count` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions.
Element `Count` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Count`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Count.value` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Count.value`, but has no comparisons.

Note that the target element context `Count.comparator` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier.
Element `Count.comparator` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Count.comparator`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Count.unit` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Count.unit`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Count.system` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Count.system`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Count.code` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Count.code`, but has no comparisons.
